text: With all the data you have stored in the cloud,
it’s important that your security is balanced to your appetite for risk.
Risk Management is a methodology for identifying, managing,
and mitigating risks with information,
assets, and operations.
Risk is a shared responsibility.
This means you should identify and monitor the potential risks to your cloud environment.
Formal risk assessment and mitigation steps should be part of any cloud implementation,
and AWS is here to help.
Tools like GuardDuty, continuously monitors for threats to a customer’s accounts and workloads.
And Amazon Inspector, which assesses application hosts for vulnerabilities and deviations from best practices.
Shield Advanced will manage Distributed Denial of Service attacks
while delivering 24/7 detection along with inline mitigations to minimize downtime.
We have Macie which uses machine learning to discover, classify, and protect sensitive data.
And AWS Trusted Advisor will analyze the environment and provides best practice recommendations.
AWS Security Hub aggregates and helps prioritize your security findings
from AWS security services and partner products.
And finally, the Web Application Firewall to manage traffic flow to web applications.
Partner with AWS and access the right tools to manage risk in the cloud and keep your data secure.
To learn more, go to aws.amazon.com/security
